user_description.ru: Ты бьёшь его плетью, тростью или флоггером по телу — ягодицы, спина, бёдра.
user_description.en: You strike him with whip, cane or flogger on his body — butt, back, thighs.

ai_description.ru: F бьёт M плетью/тростью/флоггером. Требует навыка и доверия. Тест на femdom/masochism dynamic.
ai_description.en: F strikes M with whip/cane/flogger. Requires skill and trust. Tests femdom/masochism dynamic.

image_prompt: man bent over wooden furniture, woman standing behind holding leather flogger raised, red marks on his back and buttocks, dungeon room with stone walls
